topic_or_construct: trade-off between self-interest and the interest of others
justification: The dictator game is used to measure the trade-off between self-interest and other-interest, where one participant decides how much, if any, to share with another participant who has no influence on the decision. This game design provides an unconfounded measure of human preferences regarding altruism and self-interest. The article specifically mentions using this game to investigate how generative AI chatbots predict human behavior in these scenarios.
